remarks: Deduction for elimination by cases.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Dec-2012.)
statement:
ecase2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
ecase2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( ps /\ ch ) ) $.
ecase2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( ps /\ th ) ) $.
ecase2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ta \/ ( ch \/ th ) ) ) $.
ecase2d $p |- ( ph -> ta ) $.
